sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms

These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Sawtic, a company incorporated in the United Arab Emirates with offices in Dubai, providing AI solutions and call center automation services.
If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not use our Services. By continuing to use our platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.
We may update these Terms from time to time. Your continued use of our Services after any modifications indicates your acceptance of the updated Terms.

sections.title: 2. Definitions
content: 'AI Voice Agent' means our artificial intelligence-powered voice communication system that can conduct automated conversations with callers.
'Platform' refers to our web-based interface, APIs, and all related Sawtic AI technology services.
'Call Data' includes voice recordings, transcripts, analytics, and metadata generated through use of our Services.
'Regulatory Compliance' refers to adherence to applicable telecommunications and data protection regulations.
'Services' encompasses all Sawtic AI solutions, including but not limited to AI agents, call center automation, analytics, and business integration capabilities.

sections.title: 3. Service Description
content: Sawtic provides AI-powered call center and business automation services including intelligent call routing, automated AI agents, real-time transcription, and advanced analytics.
Our Services are designed to enhance business communications through artificial intelligence, natural language processing, and machine learning technologies.
We offer three service tiers: Starter ($299/month), Professional ($699/month), and Enterprise ($1,299/month), each with specific features and usage limits.
All Services are provided through cloud-based infrastructure with 99.9% uptime guarantee and enterprise-grade security protocols.
Our AI agents support multiple languages including Arabic and English, optimized for UAE business communications and regional market needs.

sections.title: 4. User Responsibilities & Obligations
content: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal authority to enter into this Agreement on behalf of your organization.
You are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities under your account.
You agree to use our Services only for lawful business purposes and in compliance with all applicable local, national, and international laws.
You must obtain proper consent from callers before recording conversations and comply with all privacy regulations in your jurisdiction.
You are prohibited from using our Services for spam calls, telemarketing without consent, illegal activities, or any purpose that violates applicable telecommunications regulations.

sections.title: 5. Data Protection & Privacy
content: We are committed to protecting your data in accordance with GDPR, UAE Data Protection Law, and other applicable privacy regulations.
Call recordings and transcripts are encrypted using AES-256 encryption and stored in SOC 2 Type II certified data centers.
You retain ownership of your Call Data, but grant us license to process it for service delivery, AI model improvement, and analytics generation.
We implement data minimization principles, collecting only necessary information for service functionality and regulatory compliance.
Personal data is automatically deleted after 2 years unless longer retention is required by law or explicitly requested by the customer.
Cross-border data transfers comply with adequate protection standards and are subject to appropriate safeguards.

sections.title: 6. AI Technology & Compliance
content: Our AI voice agents clearly identify themselves as artificial intelligence at the beginning of each interaction as required by ethical AI standards.
All AI-generated content and responses are based on machine learning models trained on diverse datasets to minimize bias and ensure accuracy.
We maintain human oversight capabilities and provide options for callers to escalate to human agents when available.
Our AI systems comply with emerging AI governance frameworks and are regularly audited for fairness, transparency, and accountability.
Customers can customize AI behavior, responses, and escalation triggers to align with their specific business requirements and ethical standards.

sections.title: 7. UAE Telecommunications Compliance
content: Our AI call center services are provided in full compliance with UAE Telecommunications and Digital Government Regulatory Authority (TDRA) regulations.
We maintain proper licensing and regulatory approvals for operating AI communication services within the United Arab Emirates.
All voice communications are routed through TDRA-approved infrastructure and comply with UAE cybersecurity and data localization requirements.
Emergency calling services (999, 997, 998) are appropriately configured and prioritized according to UAE emergency services protocols.
We cooperate fully with UAE authorities for lawful interception requests and maintain required call detail records as per TDRA guidelines.

sections.title: 8. Service Level & Availability
content: We guarantee 99.9% uptime for our core AI services, measured on a monthly basis with automatic service credits for verified downtime.
Scheduled maintenance windows are announced at least 48 hours in advance and typically occur during low-traffic periods.
Voice quality is maintained through adaptive bitrate encoding, jitter buffering, and intelligent call routing across multiple data centers.
Our support team provides 24/7 assistance for Enterprise customers and business hours support for other tiers.
Service interruptions due to force majeure, internet connectivity issues, or third-party provider outages are excluded from uptime calculations.

sections.title: 9. Billing & Payment Terms
content: Service fees are billed monthly in advance and are due within 30 days of invoice date. Late payments incur a 1.5% monthly service charge.
Pricing is available in both USD and AED currencies, with automatic currency conversion at prevailing exchange rates plus 2.5% processing fee.
Usage-based charges for calls, SMS, and API requests are calculated monthly and added to the base subscription fee.
Annual subscriptions receive a 15% discount and include priority support, advanced analytics, and enhanced SLA guarantees.
Refunds are provided on a pro-rated basis for service cancellations with 30 days notice, excluding setup fees and usage charges.

sections.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
content: Our total liability for any claims arising from these Terms or use of our Services shall not exceed the amount paid by you in the 12 months preceding the claim.
We are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including lost profits or business opportunities.
Service interruptions, data loss, or security breaches are limited to service credits and restoration efforts, not monetary damages.
You acknowledge that VoIP services depend on internet connectivity and third-party infrastructure beyond our direct control.
Force majeure events, including but not limited to natural disasters, government actions, or internet infrastructure failures, excuse performance delays.

This includes legal fees, damages, and costs related to unauthorized use of your account, violation of laws, or infringement of third-party rights.

Our indemnification obligations to you are limited to claims alleging that our Services infringe valid patents, copyrights, or trademarks.

sections.title: 12. Termination
content: Either party may terminate this Agreement with 30 days written notice. Immediate termination is allowed for material breach or non-payment.
Upon termination, you retain access to your data for 90 days for export purposes, after which all data is permanently deleted.
Outstanding charges become immediately due, and usage-based fees are calculated through the termination date.
We may suspend Services immediately for violation of these Terms, illegal activities, or threats to system security or integrity.
Termination does not relieve either party of obligations incurred prior to termination, including payment obligations and confidentiality commitments.

Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration under DIFC-LCIA Arbitration Rules.
The arbitration shall be conducted in English in Dubai, UAE, with a single arbitrator unless parties agree otherwise.
Notwithstanding arbitration requirements, either party may seek injunctive relief in courts of competent jurisdiction for intellectual property violations.
The prevailing party in any dispute is entitled to reasonable attorney fees and costs, subject to arbitrator or court discretion.
